title: on me by section 17 of the Immigration Act 2004 (No. 1 of 2004) (as adapted by
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Immigration Act 2004 (Visas)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) 

(Amendment) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 12 September 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited immigration act 2004 (visas) (amendment) order 2023 (2) order come operation 12 september 2023

title: on me by section 17 of the Immigration Act 2004 (No. 1 of 2004) (as adapted by
heading: 2. The Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order (S.I. No. 473 of 2014) is
text_raw:
2. The Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order (S.I. No. 473 of 2014) is 

amended - 

(a) 

in Schedule 1, by the deletion of “Bolivia”, and 

(b) 

in Schedule 5, by the insertion of “Bolivia” after “Albania”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 August, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [442] 3
